**Welcome!** Create professional looking resumés.
Simply use the provided questionnaire or excel template to generate
your resumé. This project supplements Yihui Xie's [pagedown](https://pagedown.rbind.io/).

**Steps:**  

1.  Download template or fill out questionnaire in the **Resume > Inputs** tab.

2.  Upload filled out template or choose *questionnaire* as the source in the 
**Resume > Build** tab.  

3.  Click the *Generate* button in the **Resume > Build** tab to view and *Download*
when ready.
